list.name: Fix for button group: initial value did not set active buttons properly (cherry picked from commit 6ae56fe)

option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Default task
fixed exception on tooltipTitle change before DOM insertion
feat(Form): submitOnEnter submits the form when user presses enter, even if no submit button is present
feat(FormGroup): support Tooltips/Popover
button type has default
refactor(Mixins): removed Ember.required usage as it has been deprecated
refactor(Ember): updates to Ember-cli 0.2.5 / Ember.js 1.12. Fixed test failures because of missing prototype extensions
fix(Ember): updates to Ember-cli 0.2.5 / Ember.js 1.12. Fixed test failures because of missing prototype extensions. Fixed deprecations
docs(API Docs): Fixed broken handlebars code blocks. Fixed JavaScript error.
test(Button): Fixed one button test, regarding phantomjs bug, see https://github.com/emberjs/ember.js/issues/11112. Another one is still failing
reintegrated old native Ember.js modals code

feat(Ember): Upgraded to ember/ember-cli 1.13
Upgraded to ember.js 1.13.3 in preparation for a future ember 2.0 compatible version of this addon
BREAKING CHANGE This addon is not guaranteed to work with any ember versions prior to 1.13/2.0. Use the v0.1.x versions that support Ember 1.12 and lower
test(Alert): changed tests to integration style tests
refactor(ButtonGroup, DropDown): refactored parent/child registration to use mixins for simplification
refactor(ButtonGroup, DropDown): refactored parent/child registration to use mixins for simplification
fix(ButtonGroup, DropDown): fixed console warning about modifying properties in didInsertElementHook
chore(ember-cli): Update to ember-cli 1.13.8
chore(ember-cli): Update to ember-cli 1.13.8
some Ember 2.0 fixes
feat(Select): added Ember.Select replacement component
back to Ember 1.13 as default, no 1.12 support anymore
feat(Accordion): added accordion components
added accordion links
feat(Collapse): added bs-collapse component for collapsible content
feat(AccordionItem): refactored bs-accordion-item to use bs-collapse internally
fix(Collapse): fixed deprecation warning for changing properties in didInsertElement()
missing docs
added ember-wormhole
removed modal route mixins as they are not needed anymore with wormhole optimizations
removed modal route mixins as they are not needed anymore with wormhole optimizations
fixed jshint errors
added autoClose option
fixed submit handler
docs(Modal): added API docs for modal components
docs(Modal): added API docs for modal components fix(ModalFooter): wrong action called
fix(Modal): remove modal-open class on destroy
fix(Modal): closing a modal left backdrop element in DOM on IE9
feat(Modal): implemented scrollbar layout adjustments when opening modals, like the original bootstrap.js modals

fix(Accordion): Fix toggling accordion items.
Fixes #56

fix(Alert): missing fade out animation when clicking close button
Fixes #59

fix(Alert): Alert is initially hidden when visible=false
Fixes #61
docs(Form): add reference to ember-bootstrap-changeset-validations
